trans-unit.source: Contains arguments associated with changes to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" />에 대한 변경 내용과 연결된 인수를 포함합니다.

trans-unit.source: Attached events supported by this delegate include are provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager> class, and include <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInput>), <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputStart>), and <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputUpdate>).
trans-unit.target: 이 대리자에 의해 지원 되는 연결 된 이벤트 포함에서 제공 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager> 클래스와 포함 <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInput>), <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputStart>), 및 <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputUpdate>).

trans-unit.source: The input device associated with this event.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> object associated with this event.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs" /> class, taking a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputDevice" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> as initial values for the class.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs" /> 및 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputDevice" />을 클래스의 초기 값으로 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets control text associated with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> event.
A string containing any control text associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트와 연결된 컨트롤 텍스트가 들어 있는 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
The target to call the handler on.
Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.
trans-unit.target: 형식별 방식으로 이벤트 처리기를 호출하여 이벤트 시스템의 효율성을 높입니다.

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventHandler> and then invokes it.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현에서는 제네릭 처리기로 캐스팅 한 <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventHandler> 한 다음 호출 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 이 구현 패턴 및는 이유에 대 한 내용은 참조 하십시오. <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> 및 [라우트된 이벤트 개요](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets system text associated with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> event.
A string containing any system text associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트와 연결된 시스템 텍스트가 들어 있는 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets input text associated with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> event.
A string containing the input text associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트와 연결된 입력 텍스트가 들어 있는 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> associated with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> event.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> object containing the text composition associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트와 연결된 텍스트 컴퍼지션이 들어 있는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> 개체입니다.
